text:
The NBA was ALWAYS this way. It is the most predictable league of all the major sports. Even during the Michael Jordan era, whenever his Chicago Bulls were playing a low seeded team in the playoffs there was pretty much always a 100% guarantee that his Bulls would win. It was the same way for the Lakers when they had Kobe and Shaq and it's that way today with Lebron's Cavs and Golden State. 
That's one thing different about Major League Baseball and the National Hockey League. In those leagues you see more weaker teams defeating better teams in the playoffs. More upsets and more surprises. That is what makes playoffs more exciting. I'm sure the NBA could be a lot more enjoyable if it was less predictable.
